snippet.textDisplay:
I love how I wandered into a game store when I was like 12, saw a cover for this, thought to myself "I've never heard of this before, but it looks like my style of game so what the hell, I'll give it a shot".

Turns out to be one of the best RPGs on the PSX and probably the best one in the series too.
snippet.textOriginal:
I love how I wandered into a game store when I was like 12, saw a cover for this, thought to myself "I've never heard of this before, but it looks like my style of game so what the hell, I'll give it a shot".

Turns out to be one of the best RPGs on the PSX and probably the best one in the series too.

snippet.textDisplay: OH MY GOD!! I've been trying to remember the name of this game for literally years (since like... 2002) and for the life of me I could not remember the name of this wonderful game. The second I heard the music... Dem feels... Thank you so much man :)

snippet.textDisplay: I didn't like Grandia 3 at all.  I thought the story was one of the worst I'd ever seen in an RPG.  The beginning started out cool, but it quickly turned into a letdown.  I'd rather they make a new Lunar game (a good one).
snippet.textOriginal: I didn't like Grandia 3 at all.  I thought the story was one of the worst I'd ever seen in an RPG.  The beginning started out cool, but it quickly turned into a letdown.  I'd rather they make a new Lunar game (a good one).
